update sys_role
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLE_NAME = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

OPERATE_TIME = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
